## Esna 189 {-}



- Location: Column F, Middle Bandeau
- Date: Domitian
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna002.pdf#page=381){target="_blank"}
- Bibliography: None

### 189 A {-}
<div class="col2">

| *ʿnḫ nṯr nfr  *
| *ḫws Iwny.t   *
|   *mỉ ȝḫ.t n.t p.t  *
| *ḫwỉ šzp.w=sn  *
| *mk ʿḫm.w  *
| *nb-ḫʿ.w  *
| *(twmtyns ḫwỉ)|  *
| *mrỉ ẖnmw-Rʿ nb tȝ-sn.t  *
|  
| Live the good god,
| who builds Iunyt,
|    like the Akhet of heaven,
| who protects their statues,
| and guards the effigies.
| Lord of appearances,
| (Domitian Augustus)|
| beloved of Khnum-Re Lord of Esna.

</div>


### 189 B {-}
<div class="col2">

| *ʿnḫ nṯr nfr  *
| *zȝ ẖnmw  *
| *wr wr.w  *
| *ḥwỉ ḫȝs.wt  *
|   *m ḥqȝ.n=k tȝ.wy  *
|     *m qn nḫt  *
| *nb-ḫʿ.w  *
| *(ȝwtwgrtr ksrs)|  *
| *mrỉ ẖnmw-Rʿ nb sḫ.t  *
| 
| Live the good god,
| son of Khnum,
| greatest of the great,
| who smites the foreign lands,
|   since you ruled the two lands (Egypt)
|      in valor and strength.
| Lord of appearances,
| (Autokrator Caesar)|
| Beloved of Khnum-Re Lord of the Field.


</div>
